tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE episode_engagement (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255),
    air_date DATE,
    viewership_count INT,
    social_media_buzz INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_id INT,
    viewer_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episode_engagement(episode_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewer_ratings(viewer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE episode_comments (
  comment_id INT,
  episode_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_metrics (
  metric_id INT,
  episode_id INT,
  likes_count INT,
  shares_count INT,
  comments_count INT
);
